ValidationMessage.name: BoVisitAssessmentKPIInvalidDateTime
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Use the time format hh:mm [AM/PM] in KPI: #invalidKPI# for #product#
ValidationMessage.comment: The time format entered in DateTime KPI is wrong

ValidationMessage.name: BoVisitAssessmentKPIInvalidDateTimeKPI
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Enter date and time for these KPIs: #invalidKPI#
ValidationMessage.comment: Missing Date or Time Part of Date Time KPI
